info.text: [query]bro, I can't move right now I'm so tired. You got any acid I could use?data*prSTOMACH_ACID;Don't lie to me, you got none
*eats the acid* bro I see the secrets of the universe
The major components of the digestive system are the mouth, the esophagus, the stomach, the small intestine, the large intestine / colon, the rectum, and the anus.
This system takes in food, digest the food until the nutrients can be absorbed, and removes the indigestible food from the body.
These nutrients can be then distributed to the rest of the systems.
The digestive system and the nervous system work closely together. The nervous system sends signals to the digestive system that control
the digestive behavior of the body, such as eating, drinking, and the contractions of the organs involved in pushing the food through the system.
oh wow my acid is wearing off, you want some?
[You]: No, drugs are bad and so is peer preasure.
*it has seems by following the law your brain has expanded into the nervous system
